intro: Symphyostemon segethi, commonly known as the African violet, is a flowering plant native to tropical Africa. The plant features velvety, dark green leaves and produces showy, tubular flowers in shades of purple, pink, and white. Symphyostemon segethi is widely cultivated as a popular ornamental plant due to its attractive foliage and vibrant blooms.
